originalText.text: I took an instructor first aid course with Jake. He was extremely respectful, helpful and gave positive and constructive feedback. It’s evident that he wants the best representation of the material while compliance is adhered to.

text.text: I took an instructor first aid course with Jake. He was extremely respectful, helpful and gave positive and constructive feedback. It’s evident that he wants the best representation of the material while compliance is adhered to.

originalText.text:
It's a little smelly and I'm not too sure how clean the water is, though it passes all technical tests it sometimes seems a little smoggy to me. But hey, it's the only indoor pool in the neighborhood and isn't prohibitively expensive. So I'm all in. The owner (manager? whatever) is nice and accommodating.

That's my review for free swim, but as far as instruction I had lessons for my kids for about a month one summer and the instructors were GREAT.

originalText.text: Both my boys have swam at Seahorse since they were 8 and both are teenagers now.  They are still swimming there presently.  We have no issues with cleanliness or Tommy the owner. Thousands of kids have gone done through Seahorse and Tommy and I have not heard one complaint about roaches or cleanliness. The success of a program is whether it instills a love of activity of they are doing.  I can affirmative state that both my boys enjoy swimming and attending Seahorse. Seahorse and Tommy provides an invaluable service to its lower east side community, by providing affordable and accessible lessons to those that might not otherwise afford it.

originalText.text:
The people who work there are clueless . But I appreciate the program they allowed there.

Elaborate: when I first arrived I asked the woman in the office a clear questions in regards to a program that would be in the building I was appalled at how clueless she was. She had no idea what was happening in the building .  If first experience was unclear then a following day I asked her instructions she was just so confused.  I just find it hard to send my child to a place where the facility staff is lost in the sauce .

I'm grateful for the program like blue fish plus pool because the safe of this program is amazing nd clear where i feel confident leaving my child .

originalText.text:
The pool is actually a decent pool to practice in, but watch out for the roaches in the locker room!  If you don't want to deal with the rude and unprofessional director, Tommy Ho, find another pool.

I don't mind that I paid $200 for the use of the pool on 8 visits only ($200 per month, but only limited to 8 visits, not monthly use)  However, due to July 4th weekend being closed, he wanted me to pay $200 for 7 visits. Not sure what I owe?
